# Gavin Kunish – Data Scientist

Welcome to my portfolio. I’m a data scientist with a background in applied statistics and a passion for transforming messy, complex data into actionable insights.

This site showcases select projects spanning:

- 🧠 Clustering & dimensionality reduction (K-means, GMM, PCA, LCA)
- 🔍 Interpretable modeling (logistic regression, decision trees)
- 🤖 Agentic tools (in progress)
